title: Super Keen Fighter 4 Coming Very Soon! New Screenshots!
content:
-Super Keen Fighter 4 Coming Soon/Updates! New Screenshots!


With new characters created by Jera Prouduction, Super Keen Fighter 4 is getting closer and closer to completion. With more features than any other Super Keen Fighter game!

*New Updates from the demo include; improved graphics, improved A.I., improved Title Screen and music, so much more![img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-surprise.gif[/img]

*SKF4 even has a Trading Card Game which will come with it as well. Unfortunately Super Keen Fighter 4 Demo did not win the Keen Awards 2004,

Here are some new exlcusive screenshots:

[img]http://www.spatang.com/nickssoftware/images/skf4ss.bmp[/img]
[img]http://www.spatang.com/nickssoftware/images/skf4ss2.bmp[/img]

The Release Date should be around next week or so.[img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-smile.gif[/img]


Stay Tuned for this great game! It will surely be one unofficial Keen fan-game you wont want to miss[img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-deadkeenvort.gif[/img]

(1000% better than SKF2 & SKF3)[img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-christmas.gif[/img]


[url=Http://www.NicksSoftware.tk]www.NicksSoftware.tk[/url] - NicksSoftware Website

title: here ya go
content:
sorry djaser, heres a JPG picture of the newest screenshots

well any comments? questions?[img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-spotkeen.gif[/img]

EDIT: i have just learned that the Shakadi Master will not be returning to SKF4

Jera Production > I dont know about the Shakadi
NicksSoftware > the grunt is good as well
Jera Production > Its dificult to draw them
NicksSoftware > okay then we can leave the shakadis out for now, maybe a patch in the future...
Jera Production > Im telling you this because Im going away for the Summer

title: Re: Super Keen Fighter 4 Coming Very Soon! New Screenshots!
content:
Is there gonna be more than 2 moves for each character since I remember the demo had only two attack buttons and I know Mugen can handle much more.The end is near. An evil force returns. And only Commander Keen can stop him, but this time he must team up with a super sonic hedgehog and a two tailed fox.
